<Layout xmlns="urn:speedata.de:2009/publisher/en"
                  xmlns:sd="urn:speedata:2009/publisher/functions/en">

    <Record element="data">
        <ProcessNode select="article"/>
        <Message select="$nr"/>
    </Record>

    <Record element="article">
      <SetVariable variable="nr" select="@number"/>
    </Record>
</Layout>
